claim_card.claim: CF is defined as Contextual Filter: an emergent selective memory that stabilizes some GCs and suppresses others.
claim_card.test_hook: Look for hysteresis/selection effects: once a pattern stabilizes, perturbations preferentially return the system to the same subset of trajectories.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: CF (Contextual Filter): an emergent selective memory stabilizing certain choreographies while suppressing others.
